enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve managing thread states and notifications, which can be reused for setting up test cases.
Both methods depend on the state of the PseudoTCPBase instance and involve state transitions, which can be used to set up test cases.
Both methods involve releasing locks and notifying waiting threads, which can be used to construct assertions for the onTcpClosed method.
Both methods handle exceptions and manage the closing of resources, which can inform the construction of assertions for the onTcpClosed method.
